work.name: Funtory Studio
work.summary: Developed mobile games using Unity and remastered previously published titles to improve performance.

work.name: Asan Pardakht
work.summary: Automated graph and table generation using the “Bokeh” library, and predicted customer churn using fundamental data analysis techniques and neural networks. Prior to leaving the role, I developed an automation process for all tasks under my responsibility to ensure a smooth handover to the next employee.

certificates.name: Emergency First Aid at Work (Level 3 RQF)

volunteer.summary: Lead organizer for the New York City branch of the People's Climate March, the largest climate march in history.
highlights: Awarded 'Climate Hero' award by Greenpeace for my efforts organizing the march.
Men of the year 2014 by Time magazine

departmental activity.position: Public Relations Officer of Students' Scientific Chapter

projects.name: Quantum Computing
projects.summary: Quantum computing is the use of quantum-mechanical phenomena such as superposition and entanglement to perform computation. Computers that perform quantum computations are known as quantum computers.
